description: Initial primes of Cunningham chains of first type with length exactly 2. Primes in A059453 which survive as primes only one "2p-1 iteration", forming chains of exactly 2 terms.
links: W. Roonguthai, Yves Gallot's Proth.exe and Cunningham Chains
example: 53 is here because 26 and 215 are composites,53 and 107 are primes
author: _Labos Elemer_, Feb 20 2001
